short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Paste your text to have it turned into aLtErNaTiNg CaPs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you get tired typing slowly in aLtErNaTiNg CaPs? Never fear, now you can type sarcastically as fast as you would type normally! Just paste your text, click the button, and your text will be converted into aLtErNaTiNg CaPs!! Install this extension and you will be able to use it on any web page.
